 Undergraduate admissions 
 INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS Undergraduate admissions 
 Concordia offers more than  100 undergraduate programs  leading to bachelor degrees or certificates, including interdisciplinary studies. 
 Undergraduate requirements for international applicants 
 English language proficiency requirements 
 Costs and budgeting Montreal is a safe and affordable city, but you'll still need to plan your finances. Find out the cost of your tuition and where you can get financial aid in the form of loans, bursaries or part-time jobs. More about costs & financial aid More about life in Montreal 
 Scholarships, awards and bursaries Funding is available to undergraduate students from university or government sources. Even international students may be eligible for funding – so be sure to search our databases thoroughly.  Search for awards 
 Concordia in your area Our recruitment team attends high schools and education fairs around the world. Check our travel schedule to see when we plan to visit your area. See when we'll be visiting
